channel.desc: Whether its sports, esports, UCI, Ironman, F1, WRC, TV, music, festivals, films or videos, Red Bull TV has it all!

programme.title: Gaming the Real World
programme.sub-title: Video games shaping cities of the future
programme.desc: Global population growth and urban sprawl are outpacing the resources needed to adequately plan communities. But a visionary group of gamers and developers have a dream to utilise games like Minecraft to help make positive changes in the real world.
programme.series-desc: Visionary gamers, developers, and government officials dream of how games can shape the world of tomorrow.

programme.title: MotoGP™: Inside Pass
programme.desc: We journey to Argentina with Vanessa Guerra and take a quick look at last year's unpredictably wet race before looking ahead to 2019. See the reaction time the riders have as they play a game and hear a little friendly competition between team-mates.
programme.series-desc: We journey to Argentina with Vanessa Guerra and take a quick look at last year's unpredictably wet race.

programme.title: Oh My Gosh
programme.desc: The UK rave scene brings together a coalition of youth who leave labels behind to shape the culture. DJ Monki opens his camera roll, Kwake Bass illustrates the irresistibility of a 4/4 beat, and Capo Lee and Fredwave get down on the microphone.
programme.series-desc: The UK rave scene brings together a coalition of youth who leave labels behind to shape the culture.

programme.title: Out of Frame
programme.desc: Learn the story of a skater who went blind, but kept on skating. Find out how Dan Mancina adapted, and continued with his passion despite the greatest of challenges, as we meet exclusively with a remarkable human being.
programme.series-desc: Going blind didn’t stop Dan Mancina from pursuing his skateboarding passion.

programme.title: Out of Frame
programme.desc: Enigmatic Japanese skateboarder Gou Miyagi rides with a rare elegance and creativity. Watch as we chat to fellow skaters and those who know him best to find out more about Gou and how his artistic street style is influencing boarding culture.
programme.series-desc: Meet Gou Miyagi, an enigmatic Japanese skateboarder with a unique creative vision.

programme.title: Hanging Spear
programme.desc: Join world class whitewater kayakers Steve Fisher and Pat Keller as they explore the Hanging Spear Gorge of the Opalescent River, the highest source of the Hudson and the deepest part of New York State’s High Peaks wilderness.
programme.series-desc: World class whitewater kayakers Steve Fisher and Pat Keller explore the Hanging Spear Gorge.

programme.title: Kilimanjaro: Mountain of Greatness
programme.desc: Hans Rey, Danny MacAskill and Gerhard Czerner head out on the mountain bike journey of a lifetime. Facing intense altitude challenges and health risks, this team attempt to conquer Mount Kilimanjaro on two wheels.
programme.series-desc: Facing intense altitude challenges and health risks this team set out to conquer Tanzania's Mount Kilimanjaro.

programme.title: Mike Meets
programme.desc: Mike Chen meets Belgian World Rally Championship driver Thierry Neuville, who's finished runner-up in the WRC four times and is widely considered to be one of the most talented drivers the sport has ever seen.
programme.series-desc: Mike Chen meets four-time World Rally Championship runner-up Thierry Neuville.

programme.title: Faces of Dav
programme.desc: Chris and crew go skiing in the burgeoning ski town of Revelstoke, B.C. before heading out for some runs in the backcountry. Dav shows you don't need exotic trips to enjoy skiing with friends.
programme.series-desc: Chris Davenport does all that he does to have fun skiing, and skiing powder is where he's at his happiest.

programme.title: Faces of Dav
programme.desc: Chris 'Dav' Davenport is a professional skier, an adventurer, and a mountaineer. He has mastered nearly every aspect of the sport, and his biggest adventure yet is trying to ski Mount Everest.
programme.series-desc: Chris Davenport's innovative career and repeated personal reinvention has earned him much-deserved respect.

programme.title: Hubertusjagd SE4
programme.desc: Original host of the toughest motorsports rally in the world, Dakar, Senegal is a powerful and colourful city. Hubertus von Hohenlohe explores the local markets for food, fashion and art.
programme.series-desc: Hubertus von Hohenlohe explores the markets for food, fashion and art in Dakar, Senegal.

programme.title: One Final Run
programme.desc: Bomber and Life make it to BlizzCon, where the pressure's on in the first round with intense matches. Bomber is on a roll, but can he actually make it through to the finals and take a world championship? Can Life vanquish a series of tough opponents?
programme.series-desc: Bomber and Life have made it to BlizzCon, where the pressure is on with intense StarCraft II matches.

programme.title: MX Nation
programme.desc: After making the decision to leave his longtime sponsor KTM, Ken Roczen and his new team have to prove themselves all over again in their pursuit of the 2015 championship. Will Ken again claim victory, or has he painted a bigger target on his back?
programme.series-desc: Ken Roczen has to compete against Ryan Dungey and former teammates in defence of his MX championship title.

programme.title: All Day SJ
programme.desc: Scotty James and Pecky arrive back in Australia and hit the road to Mt Buller in Victoria – the mountain where it all started for SJ. It's time for the pair to pitch their big idea and make their halfpipe dream come true.
programme.series-desc: Scotty James and Pecky arrive back in Australia and hit the road to Victoria.

programme.title: Stronger
programme.desc: With a line-up of riders including Travis Rice, Kazu Kokubo, Gigi Rüf, and Scott Stevens, Union Binding's new film is set to blow minds with a full-length 4K snowboarding shred fest. From big mountain lines to urban rails, this flick has it all.
programme.series-desc: The newest film from Union Binding features 4K shredding from their stacked roster of riders.

programme.title: Motorkite Dreaming
programme.desc: The weather wreaks havoc both in the air and on the ground as Aidan Glasby, Daryl Clarke and the microlight crew travel through the Australian Outback. Sweeping winds and a rainstorm make for precarious rides through the landscape.
programme.series-desc: The weather wreaks havoc for Aidan Glasby’s and Daryl Clarke’s microlight adventure in the Australian Outback.

programme.title: Drivin' Dirty with Bryce Menzies
programme.desc: Bryce Menzies touches down in Spain to race rallycross at the Barcelona X Games. Before the race, the crew enjoys the Spanish culture and nightlife. When a storm rolls in and turns the course into a mud bog, Bryce wonders if he’ll get to race at all.
programme.series-desc: Bryce Menzies touches down in Spain to race rallycross at the Barcelona X Games.

programme.title: Drivin' Dirty with Bryce Menzies
programme.desc: In the midst of a busy racing schedule, Bryce and the crew head out to Tennessee to race some rallycross at Bristol. Once the race in Bristol is over, the crew hops on a plane to catch another race at the Chicagoland Speedway.
programme.series-desc: In the midst of a busy racing schedule, Bryce and the crew head out to Tennessee, USA to race some rallycross.

programme.title: Explorers: Adventures of the Century
programme.desc: BASE jumper Karina Hollekim risks an extreme jump at Hand of Fatima in the Malian desert, but this stunning cliff formation in the Sahel region of West Africa, located far from civilization, proves a daunting challenge due to high winds and heat.
programme.series-desc: BASE jumper Karina Hollekim risks an extreme 600m jump from Hand of Fatima in the Malian desert.

programme.title: Majid Jordan
programme.desc: Toronto-based R 'n' B duo, and Drake proteges, Majid Jordan have come a long way from making music only for themselves. Go behind the scenes of their first tour as the two friends create, perform and emerge from their mentor's shadow.
programme.series-desc: Go behind the scenes with Toronto-based R 'n' B duo Majid Jordan as they go on their first live tour.

programme.title: Mind of a Beast
programme.sub-title: Daigo Umehara: Japan's first pro gamer
programme.desc: Daigo Umehara has been at the top of the competitive Street Fighter world since he was a teenager. Daigo opens up about the difference between himself and his competitive persona, Umehara, and talks about why he embraces each new challenge he faces.
programme.series-desc: Daigo Umehara has been at the top of the Street Fighter world for years, but still loves each new challenge.

programme.title: Fast Life
programme.desc: As Loïc Bruni and the rest of the UCI downhill racers approach the end of the 2017 season, take a look back on the most memorable moments, heaviest crashes, thrilling victories and crushing defeats of the year.
programme.series-desc: As the 2017 season comes to a close, take a look back at the most memorable moments of the year.

programme.title: Iron to the Core
programme.desc: Decorated long-distance triathlete Sebastian Kienle gives an inside look at what it takes to be an IRONMAN athlete. From preparation to race day, it's a life spent enduring gruelling trials, but every small success makes the arduous journey worth it.
programme.series-desc: Long-distance triathlete Sebastian Kienle gives an inside look at what it takes to be an IRONMAN athlete.

programme.title: Motorkite Dreaming
programme.desc: Aiden Glasby and Daryl Clarke embark on an ambitious adventure across Australia with a pair of modest microlight aircrafts. Accompanied by their fiancées, Lexi and Elsie, and a local guide, Bart, they fly to their first stop: Wardang Island.
programme.series-desc: Aiden Glasby and Daryl Clarke embark on an adventure across Australia with modest microlight equipment.

programme.title: In House
programme.desc: Volcom Pipe Pro continues with some bigger names taking their turn. Follow Ian Walsh, Jamie O'Brien and Adriano de Souza, among others, as they take on the legendary Pipeline in Oahu, Hawaii, each of them wanting that victory more than anything.
programme.series-desc: Follow the journeys of the world's greatest surfers as they take on Hawaii's legendary Banzai Pipeline.

programme.title: Hubertusjagd SE6
programme.desc: Hubertus von Hohenlohe makes his way to one of the top locations to visit in South America – Medellin, Colombia. He digs into the history and the way this city has transformed in recent years.
programme.series-desc: Hubertus von Hohenlohe discovers the historic and cultural treasures of Medellin, Colombia.

programme.title: I am the Engine
programme.desc: Raízs is a farm-to-table e-commerce platform that connects consumers to healthier food and the people who grow it. This builds bonds between farmers and the people who eat their crops.
programme.series-desc: Raízs is a farm-to-table platform that connects consumers to healthier food and the people who grow it.

programme.title: I am the Engine
programme.desc: An organisation in Los Angeles is transforming the lives of former gang members through community and hope. Homeboy Industries allows people a chance to go from “shedding blood to baking bread”.
programme.series-desc: An organisation in Los Angeles is transforming the lives of former gang members through community and hope.

programme.title: Keep Your Tips Up
programme.desc: Sean and Callum Pettit, and snowboarders Eric and John Jackson take advantage of Whistler’s epic springtime powder. Back in town, the boys rip it up in the skate park by day while Groovemeister hops in the wresting ring by night.
programme.series-desc: It’s springtime in Canada, and the Pettit bros are taking full advantage of Whistler’s epic conditions.

programme.title: Keep Your Tips Up
programme.desc: Sean sets the scene for his ambitious new skiing concept at the Revelstoke Mountain Resort in British Columbia, Canada. It’s a project full of never-before-seen features, top skiing talent, and epic explosions taken straight from an action film.
programme.series-desc: Keep Your Tips Up S2E7

programme.title: Escape. Create.
programme.desc: Something of a creative genius, mountain biker Dan Atherton designs intense, difficult trails for himself and his brother Gee, and sister Rachel. Watch as they perform amazing tricks on Dan's highly technical courses.
programme.series-desc: Dan Atherton designs intense BMX trails for himself and his sibling, brother Gee and sister Rachel.

programme.title: Finding the Line
programme.sub-title: A heartfelt journey on the edge of big mountains
programme.desc: Olympian and X Games Slopestyle champion Anna Segal and her Freeride World Tour, big mountain skiing sister, Nat Segal, use their skiing to understand fear and how it manifests in their lives.
programme.series-desc: Anna Segal and Nat Segal use their skiing to understand fear and how it manifests in their lives.

programme.title: Let's Get It Wright
programme.desc: After winning the Phoenix Am, Red Bull's Zion Wright became a national name in skateboarding. Zion returns home to Jupiter, Florida, United States, to spend time with his family and prep for the upcoming Tampa Am.
programme.series-desc: Skateboarder Zion Wright returns home to Jupiter, Florida, USA, for some family time and competition prep.

programme.title: Hotel Uzbekistan
programme.sub-title: From a hotel to a yurt
programme.desc: A group of skateboarders travel to Uzbekistan seeking adventure, from jumping into rivers, to getting familiar with the local metro and finding undiscovered skate spots the country has to offer.
programme.series-desc: Vladik Scholz, Rob Wootton, Ethan Loy and Pasha Kuznetsov travel to Uzbekistan seeking adventure.

programme.title: Hotel Uzbekistan
programme.desc: The crew head west on a train to explore a new part of Uzbekistan and see what skate spots it has to offer. As they get to their next location they step into a whole new culture.
programme.series-desc: The crew head west on a train to explore a new part of Uzbekistan and see what skate spots it has to offer.

programme.title: Hotel Uzbekistan
programme.desc: From attempting a heart-pounding new trick, to riding camels and sleeping in a yurt, the skate crew continue to find once-in-a-lifetime adventure on their journey through Uzbekistan.
programme.series-desc: The guys continue to find once-in-a-lifetime adventure on their journey through Uzbekistan.

programme.title: Hubertusjagd
programme.desc: Hubertus von Hohenlohe takes you on a tour of Italy's third largest city, Naples – the home of pizza and the capital of traditional Italian music. Join Hubertus as he explores Naples's art and culture.
programme.series-desc: Hubertus von Hohenlohe is your guide to the Italian city of Naples.

programme.title: Let's Be Frank
programme.sub-title: The double life of Frank James Solomon
programme.desc: Who is the enigmatic Frank Solomon? Is he a humble big wave surfer, kind-hearted and thoughtful? Or is he something much more, a hard-living bad boy? The man and the myth might just be inseparable.
programme.series-desc: Who is Frank Solomon? A man? A myth? The two might just be inseparable.

programme.title: Fast Life
programme.desc: The season draws to a dramatic end at the final World Cup of 2018. While the overall titles are out of reach for rookies Kate Courtney and Finn Iles, it's a chance for them both to lay down a marker at the end of their debut year among the elite.
programme.series-desc: World Cup rookies Kate Courtney and Finn Iles look to end their first year among the elite on a high.

programme.title: I am the Engine
programme.desc: Raízs is a farm-to-table e-commerce platform that connects consumers to healthier food and the people who grow it. This builds bonds between farmers and the people who eat their crops.

programme.title: Hubertusjagd
programme.desc: Hubertus von Hohenlohe hits the city of Amsterdam, the Netherlands, in style as he explores a one-of-a-kind hotel room, tries the local cuisine, checks out a new neighbourhood and much more.
programme.series-desc: Hubertus von Hohenlohe hits the city of Amsterdam, the Netherlands, in style as he explores the trendy city.

programme.title: Don't Crack Under Pressure
programme.desc: Whether it's freeriding the steepest mountains, freediving the depths of the ocean or wingsuit flying over uncharted territory, the pressure for extreme athletes to perform is a force stronger than gravity. When the time comes, will they crumble?
programme.series-desc: A team of extreme athletes embark on a quest to perform perilous feats in challenging conditions.

programme.title: Crossing Corsica
programme.desc: French ultrarunner and winemaker François d’Haene attempts to cross Corsica from north to south along the legendary 180km-long GR20 mountain trail in world record-breaking time – under 31 hours and 6 minutes.
programme.series-desc: Ultrarunner François d’Haene attempts to break the record for running the 180km GR20 trail.

programme.title: In House
programme.sub-title: The road to Volcom Pipe Pro
programme.desc: The Volcom Houses prepare for Volcom Pipe Pro as the wind picks up. As much as they can plan and prepare for the event, they can't control the Banzai Pipeline, Hawaii's legendary surf reef break.
programme.series-desc: In Hawaii, the two Volcom Houses prepare for Volcom Pipe Pro as the wind picks up.

programme.title: MotoGP™: Inside Pass
programme.sub-title: Go-karting at Circuit of the Americas
programme.desc: Vanessa Guerra is in Austin, Texas at Red Bull Grand Prix of the Americas, the third round of the MotoGP™ 2019 season. The riders are used to racing on two wheels, but how fast are they on four?
programme.series-desc: The MotoGP™ riders are used to racing on two wheels, but how fast are they on four wheels?

programme.title: MotoGP™: Inside Pass
programme.desc: Vanessa Guerra is in Jerez, Spain to chat with the riders and crews. She discovers what it feels like to deploy a rider's airbag in just 40 milliseconds, as does her special guest, Andrea Dovizioso.
programme.series-desc: Vanessa Guerra enjoys fun and games behind the scenes in Jerez, Spain, ahead of the Spanish Grand Prix.

programme.title: Motive
programme.desc: Enjoy effortless style and progressive riding combined with cutting edge film-making as pro mountain bikers Dylan Dunkerton, Curtis Robinson, Matty Miles, Finn Iles, Garret Mecham and Matt Hunter share what drives their passion for their sport.
programme.series-desc: Enjoy the effortless style and progressive riding of six MTB pros combined with cutting edge film-making.

programme.title: Explorers: Documentaries
programme.desc: Mixed climber Will Gadd looks to push the boundaries of the sport by climbing the frozen 140m cave behind Helmcken Falls. Facing freezing temps, exhaustion, and an ever-changing landscape, Will's obsession is the cutting edge of ice climbing.
programme.series-desc: A story of Will Gadd's obsession with mixed climbing up the frozen 140 meter cave behind Helmcken Falls.

programme.title: Long Way to the Top
programme.desc: Focusing on the experience of touring, this intimate look at the rock star life features interviews with the alt-rock band Grizfolk, indie singer/songwriter David Ramirez and doom-metal band The Sword as they endure the trials of career musicianship.
programme.series-desc: An uncompromising, behind-the-scenes look at what it's really like being a career musician in the modern era.

programme.title: Nippon Dorifuto
programme.desc: Suzuka Twin Circuit is the first stop of five rounds in the Formula DRIFT Japan 2017 series. The pro class for this round attracted 35 cars, with entrants from around the world. See how Mad Mike fares at the first stop.
programme.series-desc: See how Mad Mike fares at the first stop of the Formula DRIFT Japan 2017 series.

programme.title: Nippon Dorifuto
programme.desc: Mad Mike heads to the Ebisu track in Nihomatsu, Japan. The Ebisu Circuit is the ultimate place to test drifting skills in the Formula DRIFT Japan 2017 series.
programme.series-desc: The Ebisu Circuit is the ultimate place to test drifting skills in the Formula DRIFT Japan 2017 series.

programme.title: Nippon Dorifuto
programme.desc: A myriad of weather conditions made the track impossibly slippery for the drivers. Despite claiming wins in Top32, Top16 and Great 8, ‘Mad’ Mike couldn’t hold on in his battle against Masashi Yokoi, who advanced through to the finals.
programme.series-desc: A myriad of weather conditions made the track impossibly slippery for the drivers at the third stop.
